lokaye boho ratawal katupol wagawa sidukara da in labena ahithakara parisarika balapam hethuwen wagawa wyapruthiya awama kara atha.boho ratawal fam oyil thuran kirima sandaha fam oyil aashritha nishpadana milata ganima sima kara athi athara lankawa thawaduratath katupol wagawa wyaptha kirimata katayuthu kirima ratehi anagathaye awasanawaki.nidasunak lesa waguru wananthara winasha karamin katupol wagawa sighrayen sidukaragena giya borniyan dupath bohomayak nirantharayen ganwathurata muhuna de.thawada sumathra dupath wala siti kshirapayi wishesha bohomayak wada wi gos atha.katupol wagawa hethuwen sidu wi athi winashaya pene penima eya thawa thawath sthapitha kirimata wehesenuye mulu parisarayama mudalata wikinimata palakayan sudanam nisaweni.

ithin apita katawath kiya kiya wadakaranna oone na.”
